subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: In the few weeks that this year has run, Guus Hiddink,  has coached in Russia, been offered jobs from the Ivory Coast to England, and decided his next post will be in Turkey.
snippet: In the few weeks that this year has run, Guus Hiddink,  has coached in Russia, been offered jobs from the Ivory Coast to England, and decided his next post will be in Turkey.
